verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, that <S%H430>God<s%> did <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H85>him<s%>, Abraham; and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Here am I.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Take <S%H3947>now<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, thine <S%H3173>only<s%> <S%H157>son<s%>, whom thou lovest, even <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and get <S%H3212>thee<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4179>Moriah<s%>; and offer <S%H5927>him<s%> there for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> upon <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> which I will tell thee <S%H559>of<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H2543>ass<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of his young <S%H5288>men<s%> with <S%H3327>him<s%>, and Isaac his <S%H1121>son<s%>; and he <S%H1234>clave<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> for the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> of which <S%H430>God<s%> had told <S%H559>him<s%>.
On the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his young <S%H5288>men<s%>, <S%H3427>Abide<s%> ye here with the <S%H2543>ass<s%>, and I and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H3541>yonder<s%>; and we will <S%H7812>worship<s%>, and come again to <S%H7725>you<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it upon <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>; and he <S%H3947>took<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> and the <S%H3979>knife<s%>; and they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3162>together<s%>.

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H1>father<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Here am <S%H1121>I<s%>, my son. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H784>Behold<s%>, the fire and the <S%H6086>wood<s%>: but where is the <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>?

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1121>will<s%> <S%H7200>provide<s%> himself the <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%>, my <S%H3212>son<s%>: so they went both of <S%H8147>them<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

And they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H559>told<s%> him <S%H85>of<s%>; and Abraham <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6186>there<s%>, and laid the <S%H6086>wood<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%>, and <S%H6123>bound<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> him on the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, <S%H4605>upon<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%>.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> stretched <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3979>knife<s%> to <S%H7819>slay<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto him out of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Here I am.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7971>Lay<s%> not thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%>, neither do <S%H6213>thou<s%> <S%H3972>anything<s%> unto <S%H6258>him<s%>; for now I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou fearest <S%H430>God<s%>, seeing thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2820>withheld<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, thine <S%H3173>only<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, from me.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H310>and<s%>, behold, behind him a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H270>caught<s%> in the <S%H5442>thicket<s%> by his <S%H7161>horns<s%>: and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%>, and offered him <S%H5927>up<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt-offering<s%> in the <S%H8478>stead<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3070>Jehovah-jireh<s%>: <S%H834>as<s%> it is <S%H559>said<s%> to this <S%H3117>day<s%>, In the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> it shall be <S%H7200>provided<s%>.
And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%> a second <S%H8145>time<s%> out of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%>, By myself have I <S%H7650>sworn<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H3282>because<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>, and hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2820>withheld<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, thine only <S%H3173>son<s%>,

that in <S%H1288>blessing<s%> I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H7235>thee<s%>, and in multiplying I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> which is upon <S%H3220>the<s%> <S%H8193>seashore<s%>; and thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies<s%>;
and in thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>; <S%H834>because<s%> thou hast <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

So <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto his young <S%H5288>men<s%>, and they rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>; and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, that it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H4435>Behold<s%>, Milcah, she also hath <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> unto thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>:
Uz <S%H5780><s%> his <S%H1060>first-born<s%>, and <S%H938>Buz<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, and <S%H7055>Kemuel<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H758>Aram<s%>,
and <S%H3777>Chesed<s%>, and <S%H2375>Hazo<s%>, and <S%H6394>Pildash<s%>, and <S%H3044>Jidlaph<s%>, and <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%>.
And <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>: these <S%H8083>eight<s%> did <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> <S%H3205>bear<s%> to <S%H5152>Nahor<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And his <S%H6370>concubine<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7208>Reumah<s%>, she also <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H2875>Tebah<s%>, and <S%H1514>Gaham<s%>, and <S%H8477>Tahash<s%>, and <S%H4601>Maacah<s%>.
